build.buildCommand: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev && echo '=== Starting build ===' && (npm run build 2>&1 || (echo 'Build failed with exit code:' $? && exit 1)) && echo '=== Checking dist folder ===' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== Checking if main.js exists in dist/ ===' && (test -f dist/main.js && echo '✅ main.js found in dist/!' || (echo '❌ main.js NOT in dist/' && echo 'Checking dist/src/main.js...' && (test -f dist/src/main.js && echo '✅ Found dist/src/main.js! Moving to dist/main.js' && mv dist/src/main.js dist/main.js && mv dist/src dist/src_backup || echo '❌ Not found in dist/src either' && exit 1))) && npx prisma generate
